summary: This script implements a training pipeline for a TreeLSTM model using MXNet and DGL. It loads a tree-structured dataset, prepares word embeddings, constructs data batches, initializes the TreeLSTM network, runs the training loop with loss computation and back‑propagation, evaluates on a development set, and saves the trained model.
business_intent: Provide an example of how to train a graph‑based recurrent neural network for natural language tasks such as sentiment analysis, showcasing the integration of MXNet, DGL, and pre‑trained word vectors.
